name: How to Crochet kit
description:
Crochet is a fantastic technique for creating 3D creatures and flowers.  It really helps you to manipulate the yarn into becoming something amazing that can have a life of itâ€™s own or to simply look pretty.

Included in the kit is absolutely everything you need to make both a cute 'amigurumi' creature and a flower hairgrip.

The kit Includes:

*Full colour 16 page booklet with 20 photos and full explanation giving you all the techniques in a step-by-step format so that you can whizz through the steps with ease. 

*Patterns for both a cute creature and a flower.

*2 balls of DK yarn,

*4mm Crochet hook,

*Sewing needle,

*Hair Grip,

*20g Stuffing,

*Scissors,

*Self-adhesive Googly eyes,

*A fabric project bag,

*4 limited edition Stitch London crochet badges

-  'Voulez vous crochet avec moi'
-  'Will crochet for cake'
-  'Will crochet for booze'
-  'Happy Hooker'

Please choose your colours of yarn from the options below.

options.name: Red and Cream (not shown but same as Red and Cream shown!)

name: Button brooch - Greens and Blues
description:
Handsewn brooch made from vintage buttons and seed beads.  

Each brooch is made by first selecting coordinating beautiful buttons from my stash, stitching them onto a felt backing and finally enveloping the edge in blanket stitch and seed beads using a metallic thread.

Swarovski crystals have been fixed to the top of selected buttons within the brooch to give a little sparkle.

There is a brooch pin sewn onto the back of each brooch.

Please choose one from the options below.

Brooches will be supplied on a backing card with my signature logo on.

options.name: A - Green circular brooch with pale blue buttons
B - Green heart brooch with black buttons
C - Green heart brooch with green buttons
D - Blue circular brooch with grey buttons
